title: Add Buttons to your Phone?
description: Dimple -  Whoosh Gadget Cleaner -   Added some NFC buttons to the Samsung Galaxy S6 in this video.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
transcript: Okay hello, I'm back. I was on a trip for a little bit, and now I'm back in the comfy studio. It's really not that comfy. Not this exact spot. It's a white table and a green chair. Some of you might not know, that the chair is green. Anyhow! What's up guys Lewis here with another video and today we're going to check out something called Dimple. Dimple Dimple.IO, Your custom buttons for Android NFC Devices. Sounds cool This is a simple, inexpensive way to add more buttons to your device. And it doesn't need any kind of external power source; It just needs NFC on your phone. It can do various things like launch applications It can turn on the flashlight Trigger your camera This is exactly as it sounds, there's really not too much to explain here. It's more of a demonstration. So I'm gonna go ahead - and as you can see here - there is a little bit of a quick start guide. "Clean the back of your gadget. Turn on the NFC. Try out the location. Long hold the button. "Install the app. Remove the adhesive backing. Stick it to the device. Follow the instructions." And then, as you can see here. I can't remember now Ah, flashlight Ooooooooooooooo Show you guys up there See that? Alright When you need a flashlight you're searching for something real quick. Boom! Buttons!
